title: TAPOUT font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me id the font used for TAPOT t-shirt.

[http://www.mmastryker.com/images/Tapout%20T-Shirt%20Fence.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173134/http:/www.mmastryker.com/images/Tapout%20T-Shirt%20Fence.jpg)

Thanks in advance

Hernando
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
I don't think this is a font. It might have started out as many sans serif fonts, but the way the letters are made to fit together seems more like a custom-drawn design to me.

- Mike Yanega
